sentences.cn: …12盎司的杏，切成了两半并去了核。

sentences.en: Agricultural production of wheat, cotton, corn, apple - rich, white apricot, pear.
sentences.cn: 农业主产小麦 、 棉花 、 玉米, 盛产苹果 、 白水杏 、 金梨.

sentences.en: Apricot processing technology of antibrowning without sulphite was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究杏的无硫护色工艺.

sentences.en: Economic crops include flax, canola, yellow, apricot, apple and so on.
sentences.cn: 经济作物有胡麻 、 油菜 、 黄花 、 杏 、 苹果等.

sentences.en: Leaving lots of apricot kernel in the bath after her weekly exfoliation.
sentences.cn: 6在每周去角质后,在浴室里留下很多皮质碎屑.

sentences.en: Lost: small apricot poodle. Reward. Neutered. Like one of the family.
sentences.cn: 遗失: 杏色小狮子狗. 酬谢. 去势的.好像家庭成员一样.

sentences.en: Nice notes of almond paste , dry apricot and exotic fruits.
sentences.cn: 带杏仁酥 、 杏及热情果香味.

sentences.en: Notes of stone fruits : peach and apricot, and juicy pears.
sentences.cn: 桃儿,杏儿以及梨子的味道清晰可辨.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To optimize the extraction process of amygdalin in apricot kernel.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究苦杏仁中有效成分苦杏仁苷的最佳提取条件.

sentences.en: The bridesmaids wore apricot and white organza.
sentences.cn: 伴娘身着杏黄色和白色相间的透明硬纱礼服。

sentences.en: The heavy curtains were a warm apricot.
sentences.cn: 这些厚重的窗帘是温暖的杏黄色。

sentences.en: The illustration shows a cluster of five roses coloured apricot orange.
sentences.cn: 插图上是一簇杏橙色的玫瑰，一共5朵。

sentences.en: The palate is very characteristic of peach and apricot.
sentences.cn: 激起的橡木香十分持久,使之令人回味无穷.

sentences.en: This almond - flavored cordial obtains its flavor from crushed apricot and peach pits.
sentences.cn: 这款杏味甜酒从杏仁和桃仁中获得味道,它叫什么名字?

sentences.en: We confirm having sold you 50 metric tons Bitter Apricot Kernels.
sentences.cn: 我们确认卖给你50公吨苦杏仁.

sentences.en: We thank you for your order of 100 tons Bitter Apricot Kernels.
sentences.cn: 感谢你方向我方订购100吨苦杏仁.

trans.tran_en: a small round fruit that is orange or yellow and has a single large seed
